urlLink Some may call it a "Ghost in the Machine", others "an explainable malfunction". I call it, a digital legacy. This morning, I sat down at my desk like so many other mornings, and began composing an email. The email however, did not respond as I expected. Everytime I wrote the word "the" it was immediately replaced with "Greenjello Lives". No matter how many times I tried to replace it, the mantra would persist. It is comforting to know that it does not matter where you go, the spirit of Greenjello will be there.
